reviewText: This movie has little going for it as do most movies of this type.  Nudity is usually the saving grace of these movies but there is little here.  Cathy Shower barely takes off her clothes and is the star so pass on this movie.
Very revealing, with an "almost believable" storyline.  Not quite enough to break out the jar of petroleum jelly or K-Y, but a good flick to arouse a first date....
Thought I already reviewed this.  I thought it was a great movie.  To see both Kathy Shower and Brandy was a very nice bonus.
The description says that this was release in 2013, but it was actually filmed in 1996. Very poor quality and just an old, corny movie.

An alright erotic/mystery/suspense with a good cast not covered with tattoos:Kathy Shower,Lee Anne Beaman,Brandy Sanders aka Brandy Ledford & Wendy MacDonald or McDonald. Other members of cast include Doug Jeffrey,Christopher James & Jay Richardson.
Jag Mundhra whom directed "LA Goddess" with Kathy Shower & Wendy MacDonald,also directed "Irresistible Impulse"
Appearances by Kathy Shower ACTING or even TnA appearances were few.
Note to Hollywood aka Satanwood:some PM's can also act &/or sing besides just modeling!
Typical erotic B movie. Kathy Shower is her usual hot self but I found the plot lacking. I am a fan of Jag Mundhra as a producer of erotic movies but I don't think this is one of his best.
